name: Singhammer IT Consulting
tagline: Leader in organizational and process optimization
description:
Singhammer IT Consulting AG is the quality leader in organizational and process optimization for IT and high-tech enterprises.
Our CFMD-certified SITE (Solution for IT Enterprises) is a vertical solution on Microsoft Dynamics NAV --and more recently on Dynamics AX-- for IT and High-Tech companies. We significantly extended Dynamics NAV/AX to meet the requirements of the industry in sales & marketing, logistics, services, projects, contracts and helpdesk.

Singhammer’s customers benefit from our focused know-how, proven methods and experience gained through over twenty years of developing and implementing our SITE solution for IT businesses across the industry as well as for our own in-house use. Currently SITE is running in more than 220 IT businesses, which we support directly and through our broad network of global partners in over 15 countries.
